reviews.text: Products are very expressive even with a value card. I could just go down valley and get a better affordable price. However, the major flaw with Aspen city market is the employees and how terrible they are trained. The problem must be the management because else who trains the employees? If the employees performance lacks due to poor training, and the manager trains the employees; therefore, the managers are not training the employees correctly. I have heard criticism that the HR's treat them poorly and unjustly. Even heard that they guilt trip their employees. Who does that? I love shopping at City market for quick pick ups, but u can't help to find myself seeing managers mistreating these employees. As a result, the employees underperform and creates aisle clogs. Don't get me wrong I do not like to acknowledge the "behind the scenes" of management, but if this is management then there is something wrong with Aspen's city market.
Nice market right in the middle of town. Isle ways are a little tight but staff was very helpful. Great selections and a perfect deli. A must stop if you’re in town for a while and need groceries.

Small location but solid selection. The prices are reasonable and City Market doesn't spike up the prices just because it's located in Aspen. Only complaints is that because it is small is that it's usually always crowded, although the lines move pretty fast. Store seems a little outdated too if you pay attention to the flooring and shelving.
Quick, had a good selection, including a fast n reasonable ready to eat dinner takeout option.
Very nice people,  reasonable prices.  Good selection

I graduated from here in 2009 in Humanities. I went and continued my studies in UCD in 2016 and I preferred Carlow College. The Carlow College lecturers and staff were top notch. They were friendly and helpful. Most knew the students names and the high quality lectures had a relaxed and personal touch. I wasn't mad about living in Carlow but the College was decent.
The museum is packed with information.  The layout is user friendly with voice tapes describing the scenes.  The museum is well staffed.  The gift shop is very small, however.
Took the ferry to Ft Sumpter from Liberty Square. What a great experience! I leaned many things about the history of Charleston on this quick trip.
Very much enjoyed everything about this place and the entire area... It's the south and it is filled with good people and good food... Cheers!
A nice park area to wait for the ferry. It's air conditioned inside and has public restrooms.
The ferry cruise and fort Sumter trip is great.
Veggie calzone was delicious and gigantic. Went on Tuesday for half off tall boy domestics and they had a great selection. Staff was friendly and attentive.
Great atmosphere with great service. You can't go wrong with this place. We ordered our food and we got it quick! Great selection of beers too!

We came from Georgia where I first encountered this chain. Over there the pizza was amazing. Simply to die for. And when we moved here I was so excited to see that there was a location near us. We drove from Lafayette to dine here because we loved the locations in Georgia so much. I was so disappointed. More like heartbroken. Our buffalo pizza stopped being made halfway up the pizza leaving a thick piece of crust. Our bbq chicken side was burnt. We asked for no onions on both sides there were onions. The crust was not like the other locations. It was hard. My son got the pretzel bites the only good thing that came to our table. It's what I expected my crust on my pizza to be. Our waitress forgot about us once it got busy. The host was the only reason this place got 2 stars. She was amazing and so friendly with my son. I think it needs to meet the management at other locations. Next time we will wait till I visit my in laws in Georgia. Such a huge let down. And dont tell me about it being burnt because it goes into an oven when 2 completely different locations have the same crust and same quality of food on the opposite sides of Georgia. There's something not right with this location.
A very clean  restaurant. Friendly staff not afraid to smile an say hello. Good food. Overall a pleasant experience
Great Pizza! Good servers with efficient service and decent serving time. Try the House special and the mighty meaty! The spinach dip is great too.
